div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Composition.url` has a context of Composition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Composition`.
Element `Composition.version` has a context of Composition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Composition`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Composition to FHIR R4 Composition

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Composition to FHIR R4.
